channel.title: Command help

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @blobboy blobboy
item.description:
@blobboy wrote:

just made this new command but i cant get it to work

if (command.startsWith("unnpc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String npcplayername = command.substring(5); int playernpc = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(npcplayername); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playernpc]; m.isNpc = false; m.sendMessage("haha i stoped u"); m.isNpc2 = false; m.updateRequired = true; m.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("try ::unnpc PlayerName"); } }
the problem is it doesnt work i type in the main server ::unnpc aplayersname and all it says is try ::unnpc PlayerName

Read full topic
